misshapen.gloss: so badly formed or out of shape as to be ugly

missional.gloss: relating to or connected to a religious mission

mistakable.gloss: so similar as to be easily identified for another thing

mistaken.gloss: wrong in e.g. opinion or judgment

mistrustful.gloss: openly distrustful and unwilling to confide

misty.gloss: filled or abounding with fog or mist

mithraic.gloss: of or relating to Mithraism or its god

mithraistic.gloss: of or relating to Mithraism or its god

mitigative.gloss: moderating pain or sorrow by making it easier to bear

mitigatory.gloss: moderating pain or sorrow by making it easier to bear

mixed.gloss: consisting of a haphazard assortment of different kinds
involving or composed of different races

mixed-up.gloss: perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements

midships.gloss: at or near or toward the center of a ship

millionfold.gloss: by a factor of a million

mischievously.gloss: in a disobedient or naughty way

mistakenly.gloss: in a mistaken or erroneous manner
